title: Mean-Eyed Cat Bar | Bryanboy
text:
February 5, 2012 — comments 6
Mean-Eyed Cat Bar
Written By bryanboy
Quite possibly one of the most interesting bars I’ve been to. Imagine a real real American dive bar with bartenders with real guys with moustaches and beards etc in the movies where you sit on a stool etc… that’s what it’s like. Amazing!
seems that you are having a great time in austin :D
xo
February 6, 2012
@BryanBoy… I wish I would have known you were coming to town.  I would have found you and bought you and Rumi cocktails.  The Mean Eyed Cat is actually a pretty interesting place.  Drew Barrymore and ScarJo have been spotted there a bunch.  I would have loved to show you around.  Hope you had fun in my town!
Texas seem harsh, but if you’re having a blast even in there, it just means that your sense of tolerance is more than admirable.
Greetings from Santiago, Chile.
